backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister with an empty actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing two frontend-related feature requirements and their associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files including layout, pages, content config, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes with global resets.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point containing the root div and script loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router with routes for all pages and provides the router to the app.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer showing business name, current year, and caffeine.ai attribution with tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive header with logo, business name, tagline, and desktop/mobile navigation menus.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Wraps all pages with a consistent header, footer, and main content area.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Centralized business info, tagline, service descriptions, highlights, and contact details.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing related queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for future React Query hooks; currently no backend methods to implement.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom theme variables for light and dark modes, including color tokens and utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page layout using Card components and siteContent fields for story, mission, and approach text.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact methods, location, and business hours using Card components and data from siteContent.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage with a hero section, highlights list, and business details populated from siteContent.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetailsPage.ts: Shows detailed information for a selected service using URL params, with fallbacks for missing services.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Lists all services from siteContent with cards linking to their respective detail pages.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, defining content paths, extending theme colors, animations, and shadows, and registering typography, container query, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the business websiteâ€™s purpose, content requirements, issues with logo rendering and deployment, and existing feature implementations.
